meanings.definition: The quality of being unable to be erased or forgotten.
meanings.sent1: Her ineffaceabilities in my memory bring a smile to my face.
meanings.sent2: The ineffaceabilities of his kindness will always stay with me.
meanings.sent3: The ineffaceabilities of her laughter light up the room.
meanings.sent4: His words left an ineffaceability on my heart.
meanings.sent5: The ineffaceabilities of nature's beauty are truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: Things that cannot be erased or forgotten.
meanings.sent1: The ineffaceabilities of history shape our present.
meanings.sent2: Family traditions are ineffaceabilities that bind us together.
meanings.sent3: The ineffaceabilities of childhood toys hold sentimental value.
meanings.sent4: The ineffaceabilities of love linger in the air.
meanings.sent5: The ineffaceabilities of friendship are priceless treasures.
